I20061212-0010

I edited a source attachment on core.jar of an IBM 5.0 VM (added a source attachment), from the build path page, and this exception appeared in the log.

This happens when an EE is rebound to a different JRE that has a different number of libraries than the previous JRE bound to an EE - we should be clearing the access rule cache for the EE when it gets rebound.

Fixed in DefaultAccessRuleParticipant. The cache for access rules was dependant on the number of libraries in each request for access rules (i.e. we computed the access rules for N libriaries and never updated if the number of libraries changed). We now re-set the access rules in the cache when the number of requested libraries change.
(Forgot to mark fixed). Please verify, Mike.
